MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG8 postcode area of Dumfries, affecting properties in River Bank and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.56pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.10pm on Friday 19th February 2021.
